resources.string: Arcane tracker will now start Hearthstone and monitor the cards you and your opponent play in the background.
The overlay will show what has been played as well as the cards remaining in your deck on top of the Game.
May the Light bring you victory!
Arcane Tracker needs storage and overlay permissions in order to monitor the game and display its overlay.
Cannot launch Hearthstone. Is it installed ?
Oops, it appears you are missing some permissions
Could not find last used deck
